definition: 38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Most of the fighting in the Korean War took place along the geographic line known as the thirty-eighth parallel.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜战争中，大多战役发生在人们所熟知的三八线上。

sentences.english: They drew a line in the sand —or rather, in this case, in the rugged terrain in the middle of the Korean peninsula —where the 38th parallel had been set down at Potsdam.
sentences.chinese: 他们在沙子上画了一条线，就是波茨坦定下的三八线。

sentences.english: The original design of the memorial was to have 38 statues to represent the 38th Parallel.
sentences.chinese: 该纪念碑原来的设计有代表三八线的38个雕像。

definition: Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
border between countries/line forming the border
Shanganling district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
38th parallel/dividing line agreed at Yalta between US and Soviet zones of influence in Korea, now the DMZ between North and South Korea
Korea Strait/Tsushima Strait (between Japan and Korea)
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
